column4: Firefox won't play videos, either with Totem or VLC plugins, any ideas?
firefox? is this flash?
not entirely sure, maybe WMV, but it was playing with Totem last night.
well kind of important to know-->what site let me check
give me a min
yeah, wmv. it's not flash. i've got both Totem and VLC plugins for firefox and i just get a plain black screen with (no video) on it.
what is the link let me check
http://s2.bgweiz.at/sebastian.rode/Neuer%20Ordner/Sound/Enter%20The%20Matrix.wmv
that is a drm'd wmv--some MS products likely could not play it
i was still playing wmvs last night though, the only thing i did that might've messed it up was uninstall the totem plugin and reinstall it.
aye, some wmv's will play-->that link gave no file at this url error
alrighty then, i'll look around at some other stuff and see what i can dig up, you look like you've got your hands full here. thanks anyway
maybe
can you give me some pointers? i already have all the codecs and restricted extras installed.
what drm--link and I will test
i'm just asking for a friend who asked me, tbh.
no idea without a link-->ask your friend for the link
i'll take a look around, i think i remember what she was talking about. in the meantime, what has an effect on whether or not the stream will work?
no time for an inchannel tutorial sorry-->if you get the link let me know however
thats fine. Do you think could you give me an idea where to look for a tutorial then?
what is the drm type
i think she was working with an encrypted WMV
couldn't she maybe run the stream through a browser on WINE?
really need to know drm type thanks
